    • addCandidate

      public java.util.ArrayList<data.Candidates> addCandidate​(java.lang.String surname, java.lang.String firstname, int age, java.lang.String party, java.lang.String profession, java.lang.String why, java.lang.String what, int vote_nro)
      Adds a new candidate.
      Parameters:
      surname - is the surname of the candidate.
      firstname - is the first name of the candidate.
      age - is the age of the candidate.
      party - is the party of the candidate.
      profession - is the profession of the candidate.
      why - is why the candidate is running for the office.
      what - is what the candidate wants to do when they get elected.
      vote_nro - is the number you will be voting for.
      Returns:
      returns all the candidates to a list with the new candidate.
